Detailed Description

Steps to initialize the ICNetwork object.

In order to initialize an ICNetwork object, do as following:

  • Retain the shared ICNetwork instance returned by sharedChannel
  • Set the networkDelegate property of ICNetwork to a valid object implementing the ICISMPDeviceDelegate and ICNetworkDelegate protocols
  • Check the isAvailable property of the ICNetwork to determine if the network channel is open and ready

Function Documentation

+ (id) sharedChannel

Returns the unique shared instance of ICNetwork.

The object returned by this method is autoreleased and should be retained in order to be kept alive.

Returns
A pointer to the shared instance

Properties

- (id<ICISMPDeviceDelegate,ICNetworkDelegate>) delegate
readwritenonatomicassign

The delegate object that should implement the ICNetworkDelegate protocol.

By implementing the protocol, the delegate is notified with ICNetwork's events
